I found this on the internet somewhere today and I laughed cause I'm a softball player and its funny....

10 reasons to date a softball player...

1) we have the perfect grip
2) we make it easy to get around the bases
3) we always pay close attention to the balls
4) we make slidin into places seem easy
5) we don't let you foul out
6) we love goin in for extra innings
7) we switch positions at least 7 times a game and we have great coordination with BOTH hands
8) we are ready for ANYTHING that is coming our way
9) we like keeping the lights on for night games
10) the game's not over until someone scores 

should i have put NOT WORK SAFE on this??? hhaha sucks to be you

ATTENTION: this is merely only another random "FUCK BRADLEY UNIVERSITY post.

- school is worthless
- i have wasted about the equivalent of 2 brand new 2006 autombiles on student loans
- im really pissed about that
- shooting film is as about as useful as all that bullshit math homework i had to do that involved numbers and letters in the problems
- why do i have to write and argumentive paper about Manipulation Ethics when the teacher doesnt even fuckign recognize my major?

only 75 more days unless i fuck up.

but hey i got a good raise at work, that matters right.

whatever i have entirely way too much shit to do...

An assignment for my studio class was to Illustrate a word or concept through pictures. My word was ANONYMOUS. All images were suppose to be shot with film on some crappy camera from the early 60's. All images were actually shot with a Canon 10D......digital baby yaaaa!! Who has time for film and chemicals anyways? If you can guess which "anonymous" LJ user this is i will give you.........a pat on the back :)

i graduate in 94 days......unless i fuck up.
I had my first assignment for my Studio & Lighting class this week. It was a dumb assignment where I had to use an assigned 5-8 objects and shoot them. Here's the outcome. I thought these were funny.

Adam went to Wisconsin this weekend for 2 days with his brother to see his dad........and I MISS HIM LIKE CRAZY!!! ahhh this is the longest we've been apart in like well the whole year we've been together. i dont know WTF i would do if he left for like a week.

On another note me and Jeffrey went and visited Mo in B-Town. We went to eat and had steak and it was oh so yummy! I dont know what i would do without meat and potatoes........probly be ridiculously skinny and healthy. Then we went to her place and drank and Jeffrey got drunk and I laughed at him. 

Today I slept in, ate McDonalds(blew the whole skinny healthy thing), then went to Photosho Boy's and helped him take his family pictures....actually I just stood there and then clicked the button whenever he had to jump in the picture, then I came home and saw my baby Charlie and he bit me.....End of weekend.

tomorrow i get to go to school and pretend i enjoy it........I DONT.

g'night.
I have like 400 pictures of Erica....here are a few more.

Sat down and figured out my student loan balances and estimated what my monthly payments will be when i graduate and I might as well sign up for welfare and food stamps right now for the rest of my life. Bradley University is going to ruin me. Then after that shocking and not so shocking reality check I decided to continue with finances and figure out and add on what my monthly bills total will be including insurance,car,phone,etc. Then proceeded to assume or estimate the least i will accept that my boss is going to pay and its not looking good.....AT ALL! i think i might cry or light Bradley on fire.....or just bitch about it. grrrrrr ugh eck *sigh* Somebody pray that my boss isnt mad at me the day i go talk to her. Its my only hope.

Photography teachers dont know shit about photography, or modern current photography.
They also dont know shit about making money by doing photogrpahy....that is why they teach it, or atleast try to.
16 more weeks and then i get to hand in my teacher evaluation that says...."have fun in your darkrooom playing with film and chemicals. i laugh at you."

School starts in like 4 days......BLAH! i'm halfway excited beacuse i know that in 16 weeks (Dec. 17th @ 10am to be exact) i will be done and NEVER have to go back!!! YAY for graduating. I should make a shirt that says "I went to Bradley and all i got was this $40,000 piece of paper" and then on the back put "F YOU BU!!".........could be funny but then again it could've been worse.....I could've went to like Alaska's University or something? Either way its almost over and then all i have to do is work and make money...not work and make moeny and do homework and go to stupid classes where they act like they actually teach you useful stuff. grrrr on that. 

....i have some kick ass pictures to post once i sort through all of them.
These totally look like senior pictures, but that is the whole point of the project. So, mission accomplished I guess. You tell me?

sooooooooo....yesterday we had our first tournament game in my slowpitch league......we won 12-5.
I kicked ass and hit 1 GRANDSLAM and 1 HOMERUN!!!...........not to brag or anything :)

Everybody is updating about their life so i might as well........

1.) Adam and I have officially been together for 365 days(sounds longer when u put it in days)......thats a freaking LOOONG time, but it only feels like 3 months. We went to Chicago and stayed at what was s'pose to be a kick ass hotel (allegrochicago.com).....they cahrged us for the HONOR bar and we didnt realize it til we ate/drank a fourth of it all.....jipped us on the black and white tiled bathroom floor......the flat screen tv wasnt flat.....2 hotel emplpyees walked in our room twice in the morning (wtf?)....but all in all it was fun and i got to take pictures and be with my boy :)

2.) Charlie has doggie superpowers and knows how to turn off the tv when he doesnt like what you're watching.

3.) I have to start back to school in a month or so. Not looking forward to that but its the last 16 weeks I will ever have to go to school.

4.) I'm worried about money and what I'm gonna do after I graduate. Dont wanna live at home forever but its stupid to find an apartment when i can live at home for free and will spend every night at Adams anyways. 

5.) I started playing slowpitch softball this summer...its pretty fun......not quite as intense as fastpitch but i've hit 1 homerun and 1 grandslam(we still lost?).

6.) I need to start working out consistently because i eat WAY too many cheeseburgers and now I drink occasionally.......so if i dont when i'm 30 i will either be dead or fat......or both.

on that note......its almost time to go home......YAY!

Adam and I went to Chicago this weekend for our one year anniversary....these are some of the more humorous pictures from the trip.......we had to leave out the one where i got a F*****G speeding ticket cause I didnt think the cop would find it funny if i got out of the car and took a picture of him writing my citation. i left the room for like 10 minutes and i come back and find adam a little intoxicated taking pictures of his "guns"....:)
barking/crying like a little baby
these have been posted before.........i just added different effects this time. January 2005 Summer 2004

.....so i realized today that it is almost July..that made me pissed cause i hate fall and winter....basically nothing good conmes after september excpet for May and that soooo far away from September. On a happy note my photo teacher from hellhole BU called today and said a band called her looking for a photographer and she recommended me, YAY.....hopefully i dont fuck that up. .......work is still boring 89.965% of the time but what are u gonna do? ..........little less than a month til our one year *giggles*!!!! ...............i actually have a tan this summer...proly beacuse i walk like 5 miles a day. .................i'm gonna leave u with a picture of my baby cause he is ohhhh so cute! ..he decided he likes to lay on the dashboard during car rides :)

i always forget to check LJ now, well actually im scared to look at it at work for the fear of getting "YOU'RE FIRED!!!". speaking of work, ITS BORING AS HELL NOW!! wtf happened? anyways...i have two pictures for ya. The first one is me...i decided to post it because its the first time I've wore my hair COMPLETELY down in like 6 years(not joking)....and i was sooo excited because people actually thought i was atleast 18!!!!! The second one is me and adam and i just thought it was cute :)!

there's days i wish i had an outside job. there's days when i wish i was a teacher so i had all 3 months of summer and nice weather to do whatever the fuck i want......today and yesterday and probly everyday til winter, will be one of those days. 

i stare at the computer
i stare at peoples faces
i fix their zits
i make them pretty
i stare at the wall
i stare at peoples faces
i wonder when its lunchtime
i wonder when i can get chocolate
i wonder when its time to go home
i wonder why i do this day after day after day after year.

I had a bonfire and the fire just wasnt performing to Amy's standards so she dumped gasoline on it and BAM this is what you get.......right next to a wooden fence:) :) my girls Me and Nate....we played softball together forever and now shes getting married. My dad brought home a puppy.........but we had to give it back :( i love puppies i want like 10 of them.

i'm sitting at work and NOBODY is here. one boss is at the airport picking her kid up from some foreign country by Russia and the other boss is at the hospital gettin a heart monitor put on. karen is also at the hospital doing soemthing with her mom and Josh decided he wanted a house so he's moving. SO as u can guess i'm BORED BORED BORED. theres nothing to do and its so nice outside. i hate having an inside job sometimes. i wish i was a construcion flag holder lady....or not. but i think it would be fun to mow yards in the summer. you're outside, getting a tan , and exercising. im also working on consolidating and applying for another student loan for the fall. pain in my ass. i found out how much i will owe when i graduate and i think i should just sign up for welfare now. not good. 
 On another note i want to go camping realy realy bad. I hope the black panther doesnt eat us when we go but we will be drunk so it might not hurt as much.  i get so bored everytime i try updating in this thing that i lose all train of thought and ...i should go now. 

p.s. if u know of anyone interested in buying a Nikon film camera let me know i want to get rid of that bitch. :)
ok so i'm a member of the "picturewhore" and "photographers" community and all people post pictures of is FLOWERS!! i'm sick of FLOWERS. yes, flowers are pretty but I'M OVER IT!!!!
He's got eyes!!!!!
I have the best bf ever. he brought me an ENTIRE bag of chocolate the other night. mmmmm Twix. You're jealous i know, and its ok i would be too :)

Dear Weather Gods,
      I am freezing my ass off and i am TIRED of it!! MAKE IT HOT OUTSIDE DAMNIT!!!!

Roxy
hi, i wunt ti say hi. theries fire outside me houser and i.m inside,. idrink to mcuhc. wherid adam? i dinot know. wtf? iam dizzy. bye

today is graduation day and i'm not included in the ceremony, FUCK! i forgot to take 12 hours so i get to go again next semester woo hoo. actually i just decided work was more important so i only took the minimum 12 hours a semester. i was reading other peoples journals and everyone is all depressed about graduating and leaving and i dont get it at all. maybe because i dont live on campus and havent experienced "college life" on that level. i'm sad because none of my friends are coming home this summer except for one and she will hang out with her other friends as usual anyways. thank god for adam or i would have no life. i played 2 softball games this week. OUCH is how i feel about that(sore legs). its awesome to be able to play again but slowpitch is just not the same as fastpitch. First off theres NO helmets so im running the bases and these crazy ass 45 year old women that cant throw a ball and hit the broad side of a barn if their life depended on it are throwing balls all over the place and coming within inches of my face. SCARY! the second game i played with a team of ALL lesbians, and i'm talking manly lesbians....i felt like i was working at McDonalds all over again. they were funny they kept calling me dude and going "hey man nice hit."....i'm like i'm a girl but thanks. i think one of them was hitting on me but i'm not sure, i can never tell. they were cool though and all younger which was cool cause everybody on my team is like 30+. work sucks ass today....the printer is making Josh mental and i have to remake a print that was done like 2 years ago and make it look "identical" to the original one. ya fuck you lady that scratched it. why the hell do i have to come to work on saturday for 3 hours anways? i should be used to it i've done it for the last 5 years. 

my best friends graduation party is today and i made her a card that says "Happy Graduation!! You suck, can I have your diploma?"...haha i'm so nice.

i played slowpitch last night for the first time ever...here's the stats:

3 rbi's
1 triple
0 errors

wahoooooo!!!

-What is their name? Adam John Kelley
-Age? 21
-Birthday? Jan. 7th 
-What do they look like? 6'0" short blonde hair(so cute), blue eyes....super cute
-Are they hot? most definetely
-Sexy? well ya
-Bangable? been there done that :)
-Name 5 interesting facts about them
*1. he's lived on his own since he was 17
*2. he's a bad ass bass player
*3. he gives the best back rubs ever
*4. he has a terdcel haha
*5. he thinks he's a better driver than me. pfft not a chance.
-Do you honestly love them? not a doubt in my mind.
-Do they honestly love you? thats what he tells me :) but i believe him.
-Have you told them? ya prolly not enough
-Have they told you? everyday :)
-If you love them, when did you first realize it? hmm  a while before we said "i love you". maybe like a month or so into it. didnt wanna freak him out:)
-Do you think they'd cheat on you? Never. 
-Would you want to spend forever with them? I hope I get to!
-Do you ever talk about that kind of stuff? ehh not really
-Have you held hands? of course thats the bestest
-First kiss- like 5 years ago down on the riverfront after our first date to applebee's and after the carriage ride. he told me to close my eyse then he kissed me and a boat full of people on the riverfront started yelling and cheering. ....this time we were on my bed i believe watching tv?
-First makeout- Same night as the second first kiss..
-Have they gotten down your pants? yeah.....
-Share one thing they like during sex? i plead the fifth... "may contain graphic nature not suitable for children or young adults"...haha no, j/k
-Are you head over heels for them? yyyyyyyeeeessssssssss.
-Would you do anything for them? I think i absolutly would!
-What would be the best thing to give to them? hmmm i dunno he wants a house so i would give him a house
What would you like them to give you? promise that he stops braeking up with me in my dreams. THAT SUCKS.
-Is his penis big enough? yup.
-Do you have any weird fantasies? umm i dont think so? why would i share with LJ if i did?
Do you plan on staying together for a while? i do i dont know about him.
-Would you ever get married to them? yes yes! i dont know what id do if he ever told me to get lost. 
-Who would you like to propose? well him duh. i'm not doing it. 
-Do you want to have kids with them? if i have kids with anybody i want it to be him. if i get married to anybody i want it to be him. but i dont want kids for like AWHILE!! marriage.... i dunno when??? 
-If so, about how many? i dont know kids would make me feel old i think
-When they're old and wrinkled, would you still love them no matter? most definetely.
-Do your friends think you make a good couple? ya they always told me id end wp with him, i guess they were right :) and i'm glad they were.
-Do you really care what they think? i dont listen to other people anymore when it comes to a relationship.
-Do you guys have a song? we've never picked one but i say Edwin McCains "Could Not Ask For More"
-If yes, why? cause the lyrics describe exactly how i feel
-When you think about them, do they make you feel like you can do anything? sure
-Have you guys ever made out in the rain? hmm no. 
-Does thinking about them make you want to listen to a dozen sappy songs? i LOVE sappy love songs...and ia mproud to say that i have 4 volumes of the TIME-LIFE Love Songs Collection!!! :)
-What about them turns you on the most? this is a toughy....i dont know why but he always looks so damn hot in his work clothes and boots??? and when hes playing his guitar
-How about what they do to you that turns you on the most? back rub back rub back rub!!!!!

Today i was to take my granparents 50th wedding anniversary pictures in my boss's studio....note that I am not an expert at studio lighting and NOBODY was there to help me set up.....crap. freaking out cause i cant get the big light to flash right and the pocket wizard on my camera isnt firing...JOSH ANSWER YOUR PHONE FOR CRIPES SAKE!! askdjfhasdfk%$^**&%$!!! somebody FREAKING help me!!! screw it lets MODEL!! i got rejected from modeling school can u tell? maybe if i would've sent them this pose i would've got accepted. DAMNIT! *in a deep Austrian Arnold voice" I WANT TO PUMP YOU UP!! wtf? i dont even know? I CAN HEAR IT THEY WEREN'T LYINg!! the ocean is really in there!!!

adam called........he's alive......and "piss drunk" as he called it. He called to tell me in his words "Honey, i'm in the boon-fucking-boonies and there isnt shit to do but i'm gonna keep drinking ok? And I miss you and I love you and godd-bye.".......then he proceeds to talk another 15 minutes and it was hilarious...i love that boy.....still dont get how someone that is afraid of heights just calmly decided to go skydiving one day??? i'm absolutely and completely terrified of snakes..like we're talking i cant even look at a picture of a snake or be in the same room as a stuffed animal snake.....liek this is some serious shit. so you think i'm gonna calmly decide to go hang out in the reptile section of the zoo and feed the snakes........FUCKIN'A NO I'M NOT!!.........but whatever he had fun so its all good. On another note school is almost out, FINALLY!!.........but all my freinds decided to not come home from school this summer, SHITHEADS. god, i hope adam doesnt dump me or i will have no one to hang out with. i should go run i have to wear a dress like 5 times this coming month.....ya know cause last time i shot a wedding i tried to wear a skirt that would not be conisdered long and that was an ignorant idea.....so we'll try a dress. ok nobody even reads this so i'm basically typing to myself........bye me
did i mention that my boyfriend decided to go skydiving today??? wtf is he thinking?? he better come back alive....

Epson blows!!! We have 2 of the most expensive Epson printers @ work and they rarely fucking work?? Yesterday it decided it feels like printine EVERYTHING green.......why green i hate green!! Nobody wants a picture of their kid looking like an alien for cripes sake!! oh ya and it seriously ate my paper!! I HATE TECHNOLOGY...............but digital is still better than film.

i have to go.
Senior Homecoming Dance October 2000....just friends fast forward 4 years....... April 18, 2005.....9 months together :) :):)!!!
